title: Crazy Peanut Butter Cookies
ingredients: ['1 c. creamy peanut butter', '1 c. sugar', '1 egg']
directions: ['Mix together and roll into balls; flatten with fork.', 'Bake on ungreased cookie sheet.', 'Makes 2 dozen.', 'Quick, easy and good.']

title: Donah'S Coffee Milk
ingredients: ['1/2 c. brewed coffee', '1/2 c. milk', '2 tsp. sugar']
directions: ['Pour 1/2 cup coffee into a coffee mug.', 'Pour in the milk.', 'Add the sugar.', 'Stir.']
